attributes.action: Mandatory jail time for anyone who harms an emergency worker
attributes.additional_details: Anyone who harms ( including spitting at, scratching etc) an emergency worker, should be jailed until said worker is back at work on normal duties plus an additional 2 years to start from that date. Sentences to be served in full. Killing or maiming an emergency service worker should carry a whole life tariff, even if such acts weren't intentional.  It's time to protect the protectors
attributes.background: The police and other emergency service workers are being attacked whilst carrying out their duties at an alarming rate. This must stop.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Minimum 2 year prison sentence for attacks on emergency workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550320

Introduce minimum sentences for attacks on emergency workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549032

Harsher sentencing for assaults' on police, emergency workers & prison officers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549077
